mapper.sql: sid, scid, sterm, sweek, ssection, spositon, is_active, sdescription, last_update_user, last_update_dt,all_people,remain_people
mapper.select: select c.coname as cname,week.ldvalue as week,section.ldvalue as section,s.spositon,s.sdescription,fre.ldvalue as freq from maritime.schedule s left join maritime.course c on s.scid = c.coid and c.is_active = true left join maritime.scmapping map on s.sterm = map.pterm and map.pcid = c.coid and map.is_active = true left join maritime.listdata week on s.sweek = week.ldid left join maritime.listdata section on s.ssection = section.ldid left join maritime.listdata fre on s.frequency = fre.ldid where map.psid = #{sid} and s.sterm = #{term} and s.is_active = true

select c.coname as cname,week.ldvalue as week,section.ldvalue as section,s.spositon,s.sdescription,fre.ldvalue as freq from maritime.schedule s left join maritime.course c on s.scid = c.coid and c.is_active = true left join maritime.listdata week on s.sweek = week.ldid left join maritime.listdata section on s.ssection = section.ldid left join maritime.listdata fre on s.frequency = fre.ldid where c.coteacher1 = #{tid} and s.sterm = #{term} and s.is_active = true
mapper.insert: insert into maritime.schedule (sid, scid, sterm, sweek, ssection, spositon, is_active, sdescription, last_update_user, last_update_dt) values (#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sweek,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ssection,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spositon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isActive,jdbcType=BIT}, #{sdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update:
update maritime.schedule
scid = #{scid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sterm = #{sterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sweek = #{sweek,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ssection = #{ssection,jdbcType=INTEGER},
spositon = #{spositon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=BIT},
sdescription = #{sdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_update_user = #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_update_dt = #{lastUpdateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update maritime.schedule set scid = #{scid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sterm = #{sterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sweek = #{sweek,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ssection = #{ssection,jdbcType=INTEGER}, spositon = #{spositon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=BIT}, sdescription = #{sdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_user = #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_dt = #{lastUpdateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
